A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Lets see\, I don't like Poe\, I don't like Holdo\, lost my love for Fin\, am baffled at how Rey is such a powerful force user. Adam driver is excellent but his character is still underwhelming. I gave her a chance but I HATE Rose.

I enjoyed the movie for the most part but it had some awful moments and in the end it does a poor job of storytelling. Both TFA and TLJ suffer from poor character development and almost no explanation as to how we've gotten from RotJ to where we are now. 

The movie would have been much better had they cut out Rose\, added in Snoke and Phasma backstory and focused more on Luke and Rey. 

Seems like this movie really does want to kill the past yet it has failed to deliver much of anything worth killing it for.

To date Rogue One has been the best Star Wars movie ever made since the original. Maybe get that team to make some more good Star Wars movies.
